targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  HealthIndex
FROM dbo.ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND Timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND Timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 1
  HealthIndex
FROM dbo.ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1
  RegimeLabel
FROM dbo.ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS EpisodeCount
FROM dbo.ACM_Episodes
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND EpisodeStart >= $__timeFrom() AND EpisodeStart <= $__timeTo()

-- Health History
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  HealthIndex AS value,
  'HealthIndex' AS metric
FROM dbo.ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND Timestamp >= DATEADD(hour, -24, GETDATE())
UNION ALL
-- Health Forecast
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  ForecastHealth AS value,
  'ForecastHealth' AS metric
FROM dbo.ACM_HealthForecast
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
UNION ALL
-- Confidence Interval Lower
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  CI_Lower AS value,
  'CI_Lower' AS metric
FROM dbo.ACM_HealthForecast
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
UNION ALL
-- Confidence Interval Upper
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  CI_Upper AS value,
  'CI_Upper' AS metric
FROM dbo.ACM_HealthForecast
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  FailureProb
FROM dbo.ACM_FailureForecast
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 1
  RUL_Hours
FROM dbo.ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT TOP 1
  FORMAT(EarliestMaintenance, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS EarliestMaintenance,
  FORMAT(PreferredWindowStart, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS PreferredWindowStart,
  FORMAT(PreferredWindowEnd, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS PreferredWindowEnd,
  CAST(ROUND(FailureProbAtWindowEnd * 100, 1) AS VARCHAR) + '%' AS FailureProbAtWindowEnd,
  Comment
FROM dbo.ACM_MaintenanceRecommendation
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT TOP 20
  SensorName,
  ROUND(AbsZ, 2) AS AbsZ,
  ROUND(SignedZ, 2) AS SignedZ,
  ROUND(Value, 2) AS Value,
  Level,
  Rank
FROM dbo.ACM_SensorHotspots
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY AbsZ DESC

-- Get top 5 sensors by current AbsZ, then show their timeseries
WITH TopSensors AS (
  SELECT TOP 5 SensorName
  FROM dbo.ACM_SensorHotspots
  WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
    AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
  ORDER BY AbsZ DESC
)
SELECT
  t.Timestamp AS time,
  t.AbsZ AS value,
  t.SensorName AS metric
FROM dbo.ACM_SensorHotspotTimeline t
INNER JOIN TopSensors ts ON t.SensorName = ts.SensorName
WHERE t.EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND t.RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
  AND t.Timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND t.Timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time

-- Get top 3 sensors from latest run, then show their forecast
WITH TopSensors AS (
  SELECT TOP 3 SensorName
  FROM dbo.ACM_SensorHotspots
  WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
    AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
  ORDER BY AbsZ DESC
)
SELECT
  sf.Timestamp AS time,
  sf.ForecastValue AS value,
  sf.SensorName AS metric
FROM dbo.ACM_SensorForecast sf
INNER JOIN TopSensors ts ON sf.SensorName = ts.SensorName
WHERE sf.EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND sf.RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY time

SELECT TOP 20
  FORMAT(e.EpisodeStart, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS EpisodeStart,
  FORMAT(e.EpisodeEnd, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS EpisodeEnd,
  ROUND(em.PeakZ, 2) AS PeakZ,
  ROUND(em.DurationHours, 2) AS DurationHours,
  em.DominantSensor,
  em.Severity
FROM dbo.ACM_Episodes e
INNER JOIN dbo.ACM_EpisodeMetrics em ON e.RunID = em.RunID AND e.EquipID = em.EquipID AND e.EpisodeID = em.EpisodeID
WHERE e.EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND e.EpisodeStart >= $__timeFrom() AND e.EpisodeStart <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY em.PeakZ DESC

SELECT
  Severity,
  COUNT(*) AS Count
FROM dbo.ACM_EpisodeMetrics
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID IN (
    SELECT RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs
    WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
      AND StartTime >= $__timeFrom() AND StartTime <= $__timeTo()
  )
GROUP BY Severity
ORDER BY Count DESC

SELECT TOP 50
  FORMAT(EventTimestamp, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS EventTimestamp,
  EventType,
  SensorName,
  ROUND(ZScore, 2) AS ZScore,
  ROUND(Magnitude, 2) AS Magnitude,
  Detector
FROM dbo.ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND EventTimestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND EventTimestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY EventTimestamp DESC

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  DriftMagnitude
FROM dbo.ACM_DriftSeries
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND Timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND Timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  RegimeLabel
FROM dbo.ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND Timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND Timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 1
  DataQuality,
  ROUND(GapPct, 2) AS GapPct,
  ROUND(NullPct, 2) AS NullPct,
  ROUND(ZeroPct, 2) AS ZeroPct,
  ROUND(DuplicatePct, 2) AS DuplicatePct,
  TotalRows,
  ValidRows
FROM dbo.ACM_DataQuality
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT
  Detector,
  ROUND(Weight, 3) AS Weight,
  Present,
  ROUND(MeanZ, 2) AS MeanZ,
  ROUND(MaxZ, 2) AS MaxZ,
  Points
FROM dbo.ACM_FusionQualityReport
WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment')
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM dbo.ACM_Runs WHERE EquipID = (SELECT EquipID FROM dbo.Equipment WHERE EquipCode = '$equipment') ORDER BY StartTime DESC)
ORDER BY Detector

list.definition: SELECT EquipCode FROM dbo.Equipment ORDER BY EquipCode
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT EquipCode FROM dbo.Equipment ORDER BY EquipCode
